TopicTitle: Too few parts in the VAP/SPH

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

these days I am going to start a new heavily modded game with a lot of parts to build fancy stuff with. But this can be a pain, because most of the time you have to scroll through lists in which you only see 3 parts per line. Is it possible to have more than 3 of them shown in a line? Even 4 would make a significant difference.

(I am already using Filter Extensions - that helps a little.)
Install The Janitor's Closet,bit was written to deal with this issue
